description.narrative: By 2020, actors in education structures at central, decentralized and community levels, particularly in the Sahel and East regions, have improved organizational and education management capacities, including in emergency situations., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, communities have a greater demand for inclusive, equitable, quality pre-primary, primary, post-primary and informal education, especially for children living with disabilities, girls and out-of-school children, and in particular in the Sahel and East regions including in emergency situations.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, actors in education structures at central, decentralized and community levels, particularly in the Sahel and East regions, have improved organizational and education management capacities, including in emergency situations.

description.narrative: UNICEF-Burkina Faso continued its support in capacity building of community members and Ministry of Education's officials at central and decentralized levels on quality education, including innovative approaches, such as EduTrac. UNICEF's technical support as the lead agency of the Education Sectoral Group (ESG) was critical to the MoE's development of the strategy on Education in emergency until September 2019 when it was handed over to the new lead. As the education cluster lead, the CO continues to coordinate and manage the emergency response in education. The indicators for this output showed a good progress towards the CPD targets. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Service Delivery - Communities - School management committees (or parent teacher association or school communities or similar structure) whose capacity was developed through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance
Number of actors involved in the management and functioning of schools for a better monitoring of child learning outcomes
